domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Surgeon_General @WhiteHouse WTF does alcohol and smoking have to do with the coronavirus? Second question; why do you have to single out blacks and Hispanics and then say it’s not about race?  You’re a disgrace bro. You’re the very definition of a sellout.
